p: Results: Median age was 60 (Interquartile Range = IQR 46-71), 57 patients (56.4 %) were male, median APACHE II score was 16 (IQR 10-19). Of the recruited patients, 78 (77.2 %) had an infective process, and 70 (69.3 %) met SIRS criteria for sepsis; 12 patients (11.9 %) had positive blood cultures, 19 patients (18.8 %) did not survive to hospital discharge.
